name: sonic-flow
description: Immersive task management app with ambient sounds and pomodoro timer

scripts.dev: concurrently -n vite,tsc,electron -c cyan,yellow,green "cd frontend && npm run dev" "cd electron && npx tsc --watch" "wait-on http://localhost:5173 && electron ."
scripts.build: cd frontend && npm run build && cd ../electron && npx tsc
